description: This file defines a class 'SourceMap' that models a SourceMap v3 compatible sourcemap, including its properties and a constructor that initializes it based on provided mapping data and options. It also includes a method to convert the object to a JSON string.

classes.name: SourceMap
classes.description: A class representing a SourceMap v3 compatible sourcemap, encapsulating properties like mappings, sources, sourceRoot, and version, with logic to initialize from generated mapping data.

methods.name: constructor
methods.description: Initializes a SourceMap instance using provided mapping data and options, converting mappings as needed.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a JSON string representation of the SourceMap instance.
